price: Um deles disse: "Não mateis a José e, se pretendeis fazer algo, lançai-o no fundo do poço, então, um dos viandantes o recolherá"
arabic: قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ لَا تَقۡتُلُواْ يُوسُفَ وَأَلۡقُوهُ فِي غَيَٰبَتِ ٱلۡجُبِّ يَلۡتَقِطۡهُ بَعۡضُ ٱلسَّيَّارَةِ إِن كُنتُمۡ فَٰعِلِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla qāilun min'hum lā taqtulū yūsufa wa-alqūhu fī ghayābati al-jubi yaltaqiṭ'hu baʿḍu al-sayārati in kuntum fāʿilīna
